changes.change: fixed preference header disappearance issue
added Quick Launch
fixed default preference loading
fixed disabling application from whitelist not taking effect
changed blacklist to a whitelist (sorry for the inconvenience
Improvements to Settings header/title
Settings loading improvements which improves overall performance
Added option to dismiss switcher on last application close
Added option to perform one button action which performs the action of the only enabled button
Added option to invert QuickAction and Alert
Changed [app] to not display the application name instead of identifier
Added [app id] to display application identifier
Improve performance by not hooking older switcher methods on newer iOS versions
Fixed issue with Close Application and Relaunch Application QuickAction causing SpringBoard crashes on homescreen swipe up
Added Relaunch-All Applications option
Added new QuickAction of Relaunch-All Applications
Added QuickAction on swipe down
Added continue now playing application when killing all applications
Fixed respring button causing safemode issue on iOS 9.3.3
Added option to enable/disable whitelist
Added option for vertical offset (iOS 9+)
Fixed dismissing switcher alert action causing issues on iOS 8
Fixed relaunch causing issues on iOS 8
Added option to customize alert text
Added option to blacklist applications to display alert for
Added homescreen swipe up alert with options to Respring, Kill-All Applications and Cancel
Fixes swiping up too fast on iOS 9 issue
Added iOS 9 support
No known data of the changes
No known data of the changes
